item.title: Short Bio
item.description: Education Université Paris Cité M2 level MSc student at the Parisian Master of Research in Computer Science (MPRI) University of Athens Undergraduate degree in Dept. of Informatics & Telecommunications October 2019 - July 2023 Track A (conforming to ACM “Computer Science” curriculum) Specialization: Foundations of Computer Science Thesis: Hash-based signatures via zk-SNARKs, supervised by Pyrros Chaidos Experience Research Internship (April-August 2024), IRIF - Paris Cité University, ”Advanced Post-Quantum Signatures”,

item.title: Contact
item.description: email: themelis at irif dot fr address: Office 3010, 8 place Aurélie Nemours, 75013 Paris

item.title: About
item.description: I am a MSc student at the Parisian Master of Research in Computer Science (MPRI) at Université Paris Cité. Currently, I’m doing my M2 internship at the Institut de Recherche en Informatique Fondamentale (IRIF), Université Paris Cité. I am lucky to be under the supervision of Geoffroy Couteau. In 2023, I graduated from the Department of Informatics & Telecommunications at the University of Athens. I am strongly interested in number-theoretic cryptography and especially “post-quantum” stuff.
